item.title: FastEndpoints
item.description: A light-weight REST API development framework for ASP.NET 8 and newer.

item.title: faker-csharp
item.description: Faker for C#.

item.title: Faker.Net
item.description: Generate massive amounts of fake data in .NET (abandoned).

item.title: GenFu
item.description: GenFu is a library you can use to generate realistic test data. It is composed of several property fillers that can populate commonly named properties through reflection using an internal database of values or randomly created data. You can override any of the fillers, give GenFu hints on how to fill them.

item.title: Cloudflare.NET
item.description: .NET SDK to interact with the Cloudflare REST API, and R2 Object Storage.

item.title: lzo.net
item.description: Implementation of the lzo decoder in plain C#/.NET.

item.title: K4os.Compression.LZ4
item.description: LZ4/LH4HC compression for .NET Standard 1.6/2.0 (formerly known as lz4net).

item.title: Deep .NET
item.description: YouTube playlist with deeper dive into .NET from Microsoft.
.NET Conf 2022.

item.title: Cake
item.description: Cake (C# Make) is a free and open source cross-platform build automation system with a C# DSL for tasks such as compiling code, copying files and folders, running unit tests, compressing files and building NuGet packages.

item.title: Abblix Oidc.Server
item.description: Flexible OpenID Connect and OAuth 2.0 server-side implementation for modern ASP.NET projects.

item.title: AspNetSaml
item.description: Popular SSO/SAML library for ASP.NET.

item.title: Apache Spark for .NET
item.description: .NET bindings for Apache Spark for large-scale data processing.

item.title: Deedle
item.description: Easy to use .NET library for data and time series manipulation and scientific programming.

item.title: ML.NET
item.description: ML.NET is an open source and cross-platform machine learning framework for .NET.

item.title: Argx
item.description: A modern command-line argument parsing library for .NET.

item.title: CliFx
item.description: Declarative framework for building command line interfaces with dependency injection and validation support.

item.title: Cocona
item.description: Micro-framework for .NET console application. Cocona makes it easy to build console applications with command line parsing.

item.title: Colorful.Console
item.description: Style your .NET console output with ease using RGB colors and gradients.

item.title: CommandLineParser
item.description: The best C# command line parser that brings standardized *nix getopt style to .NET.

item.title: Crayon
item.description: Extremely simple console coloring for .NET applications.

item.title: Gui.cs
item.description: Cross-platform Terminal UI toolkit for .NET that makes it easy to build rich console applications.

item.title: Sharprompt
item.description: Interactive command-line prompts for .NET Core inspired by Inquirer.js.

item.title: Spectre.Console
item.description: A .NET library that makes it easier to create beautiful console applications.

item.title: System.CommandLine
item.description: System.CommandLine is a powerful command line parser for building modern CLI applications.

item.title: FastLZMA2Net
item.description: Fast LZMA2 Wrapper for .NET. Windows only.

item.title: SharpCompress
item.description: Fully managed C# library to deal with many compression types and formats.

item.title: Snappier
item.description: Pure C# port of Google's Snappy compression algorithm. It is designed with speed as the primary goal, rather than compression ratio, and is ideal for compressing network traffic.

item.title: Snappy
item.description: Uses P/Invoke to C++ for great performance. However, it only works on Windows, and is a bit heap allocation heavy in some cases. It also hasn't been updated since 2014 (as of 10/2020). This project may still be the best choice if your project is on the legacy .NET Framework on Windows, where Snappier is much less performant.

item.title: ZstdSharp
item.description: Port of zstd compression library to C#.

item.title: Sharpliner
item.description: Use C# instead of YAML to define your Azure DevOps pipelines.

item.title: Apache Avro
item.description: Apache Avro is a data serialization system with .NET implementation.

item.title: ClosedXML
item.description: ClosedXML makes it easier for developers to create Excel 2007+ files.

item.title: CsvHelper
item.description: Library to help reading and writing CSV files.

item.title: EPPlus
item.description: EPPlus-Excel spreadsheets for .NET.

item.title: ExcelDataReader
item.description: Lightweight and fast library for reading Microsoft Excel files.

item.title: FileHelpers
item.description: The FileHelpers library for importing/exporting data from fixed length or delimited records in files databases or streams.

item.title: FlatBuffers
item.description: Memory efficient serialization library with .NET support.

item.title: Json.NET
item.description: Popular high-performance JSON framework for .NET.

item.title: MemoryPack
item.description: Blazing fast, zero-cost binary serialization.

item.title: MessagePack
item.description: Extremely Fast MessagePack Serializer for C# with built-in LZ4 compression.

item.title: NPOI
item.description: .NET library for reading and writing Microsoft Office binary and OOXML file formats.

item.title: Parquet.Net
item.description: Fully managed Apache Parquet implementation.

item.title: Protobuf
item.description: Google's data interchange format, an official .NET library.

item.title: Protobuf-net
item.description: Protocol Buffers library for idiomatic .NET.

item.title: Bogus
item.description: A simple fake data generator for C# F# and VB.NET for testing and seeding databases.

item.title: Dapper
item.description: Dapper is a simple object mapper for .NET and owns the title of King of Micro ORM in terms of speed.

item.title: Entity Framework Core
item.description: EF Core is a modern object-database mapper for .NET. It supports LINQ queries change tracking updates and schema migrations.

item.title: Marten
item.description: .NET Transactional Document DB and Event Store on PostgreSQL.

item.title: Npgsql
item.description: The .NET data provider for PostgreSQL.
